commit message:
photophase: fix proguard entry

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

photophase: use etc1 compression when available

When available this help to decrease the memory footprint. ETC1
compression
requires to:

- be supported by opengl
- picture couldn't have an alpha channel
- compression times shouldn't be too higher (< 1000 ms)
- initial pictures doesn't be compressed (to speed up boot)

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

photophase: don't reset transition timer on pause

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

photophase: allow to choose more than one minute for transition timers

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

Version 1.0.9 (1011) - Take II

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>

Version 1.0.9 (1011) - Take III

Increase max acceptable compression time

Signed-off-by: Jorge Ruesga <jorge@ruesga.com>
